implementation.parameter: Zekiel the guardian: "This is the first step of the test and the domain of Malleus."
You step onto a sparkling corner of the hexagram, this must be what Zekiel the guardian was talking about.
This looks like a creature matching the theme of Malleus ... perhaps this is the one to select.
Zekiel the guardian: 'You have chosen the correct one of Malleus. Now use the candle at the shimmering spot of the hexagram.'

new MultipleActions([new SendPrivateMessageAction("Zekiel the guardian: 'You have chosen the correct one of Malleus. Now use the candle at the shimmering spot of the hexagram.'"), new EquipItemAction("candle"), new SetQuestAction("zekiels_practical_test", "second_step")])
You must hold your candle over this spot, walk here with a candle and it will float.
Zekiel the guardian: "This is the second step of the test and the domain of Jaer."

You must hold your candle over this spot, walk here with a candle and it will float.
You find it hard to enter. Perhaps you're not prepared for what is below.

entity.attribute: There is an inscription on the plinth of the statue. You read: "These catacombs were built to hold the mortal remains of the brave men and valiant women who gave their lives to save ours. Our debt can never be repaid. They have earned our undying gratitude. We, the people of Semos, will never forget their sacrifices."

point-of-interest.name: Semos Catacombs
point-of-interest.description: A hole in the ground on Semos graveyard. Prepare yourself well to fight the undead.

entity.attribute: This ground has been fertilised so that flowers can grow here. Ask me (Jenny from the Mill) for seeds or bulbs! Note: the area is open so once your flower is ready, anyone can pick it. Thanks for planting the nice flower for all to enjoy.

This ground has been fertilised so that flowers can grow here. Ask me (Jenny from the Mill) for seeds or bulbs! Note: the area is open so once your flower is ready, anyone can pick it. Thanks for planting the nice flower for all to enjoy.

This ground has been fertilised so that flowers can grow here. Ask me (Jenny from the Mill) for seeds or bulbs! Note: the area is open so once your flower is ready, anyone can pick it. Thanks for planting the nice flower for all to enjoy.

As you read this sign I want you to know that I realized the meaning of these flowers...
If you plant a flower, you don't plant it for yourself. You plant it as a present for someone else. People who say "Oh, that's my flower and nobody else should get it!" will get disappointed... It is very difficult to pick your own flowers. You have to make a present to another player with planting a flower and then one day you will get the reward by finding a flower, which someone else has planted as a present for others. :)
It would be so beautiful if everyone plants as much flowers as he picked. Don't take more than you give and you will get as much as you need! :)
If everybody would think so, we were on the way to a better world...
- signed by S.
North: Old mine East: Mill South: Semos city

point-of-interest.name: Semos Caves South Entrance
point-of-interest.title: Semos Caves
point-of-interest.description: One of several entrances to the tunnel system below the northern mountains. The way to Mithrilbourgh and connection to Ados caves. (Player Level 15 - 125)

point-of-interest.name: Semos Caves North Entrance
point-of-interest.title: Semos Caves
point-of-interest.description: One of several entrances to the tunnel system below the northern mountains. The way to Mithrilbourgh and connection to Ados caves. Use with caution, if you are still low level. (Player Level 15 - 125)

entity.attribute: KNOW HOW TO KILL CREATURES by Hayunn Naratha My personal favorite has always been to right-click and choose to ATTACK a creature. You can't go wrong with that! The sharper minded amongst you might prefer to click directly on the creature. It works too!
You see one of Hayunn's best shields, now only gathering dust on display.
This burnished coat of armor looks tempting to borrow, but it's firmly attached to that stand.
You see a strange kind of plate armor, made from some rare metal you do not recognize.

NISHIYA'S SHEEP FARM
Buy sheep from Nishiya to get the best prices!
Talk to Sato about selling your sheep. His prices aren't very good, but unfortunately it's a buyer's market... He pays more for bigger sheep (try to get a weight of at least 100).

Mature sheep wanted: please speak to Sato.

DUNGEONS
Caution: These dungeons contain many rats, and more dangerous creatures. Enter at own risk.
Assistance needed, to help with pizza deliveries.
You see a nice clean table for resting your drinks on.
You read: "The Old Semos Tavern" This sounds like a very nice place to meet some interesting people and have a nice evening together.
According to the cross on the roof, this must be the Semos temple. You have the strange feeling that someone in there is already waiting for you...
The sign says: "Bakery and pizza delivery. Daily fresh bread!" Ahh nice, you can already smell it. And in small letters below is added: "New! Leander's tasty sandwiches!"
Welcome to Semos Bank! Proprietor: Semos Bank Merchants Ltd.

QUOTES OF FAMOUS FISHERMEN
Fisherman Bully: Clownfish are always good for a laugh.
Fisherman Jacky: Don't mistake your trout for your old trout, she wouldn't taste so good.
Fisherman Tommy: I wouldn't trust a surgeonfish in a hospital, there's something fishy about them.
Fisherman Sody: Devout Crustaceans believe in the One True Cod.
Fisherman Humphrey: I don't understand why no-one buys my fish. The sign says 'Biggest Roaches in town'.
Fisherman Monty: My parrot doesn't like to sit on a perch. He says it smells fishy.
Fisherman Charby: That fish restaurant really overcooks everything. It even advertises char fish.
Fisherman Ally: Holy mackerel! These chips are tasty.

implementation.parameter: Semos Mines and the Kobold city of Wofol

entity.attribute: The island of Athor is famous for its golden beaches. Having long been an untouched piece of nature, it has become a holiday paradise since a ferry service was installed. Little do the tourists know about the dangers that lurk under the surface...

The dwarf mine west of Or'ril castle is one of the main iron ore resources of Faiumoni. Even rumors of a dragon living under the earth cannot stop the industrious dwarves from digging further and further into the mountain.
Adventurers have described the effects of poisonous creatures and mushrooms as not only unhealthy, but also as confusing for the orientation. They recommend always to take an antidote with you.
You see a proclamation from Mayor Sakhs stating that the citizens of Semos are doing a really great job in preventing monsters from taking over the streets. Keep up the good work.
This is Carmen's fan. She dropped it last time she was in here. Hopefully she will see it next time and remove it.
You see a scrap of paper with nonsense on it. Perhaps someone's attempt at humor... You know those people who work at banks ;)
You see an announcement for next month's meeting of Rat Killers Anonymous.
You see a sock belonging to Starkad. Diogenes is pranking him. :D
You see a wanted poster for a dragon which is pestering citizens of Semos.
You see a letter to Eonna from Ados Exterminators, Inc. Wonder why she had to get help from another town?
You see an ad to sell armor to Xin Blanca.
You see Ricardo's license for gambling. Why would it be hanging here?
You see a ticket to next year's SUPERSESSION
You see a locket. Wonder who it belongs to?
You can't see what is behind the plant.
Gordon, I miss you so. Please come to see me sometime. Sorry to have this put up on the bank bulletin board, but I don't have your address. Femme Fatale
You see a map of far off Athor. You long for a vacation. You are thinking of visiting Athor.
You see a shopping list, dropped by Hayunn Naratha. Funny, most of the items are different kinds of beer and ale.
